pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![geomapiLogo](https://gitlab.kuleuven.be/uploads/-/system/project/avatar/7619/GeoMapiLogo.png?width=64)# GeomAPIA joint API to standardize geomatic data storage and processing.Developed by the Geomatics research group at the KU Leuven ## InstallationUse the package manager [pip](https://pypi.org/project/geomapi) to install geomapi.```bashpip install geomapi```## DocumentationYou can read the full API reference here:[Documentation](https://geomatics.pages.gitlab.kuleuven.be/research-projects/geomapi/)## Quickstart```pyimport geomapifrom geomapi.nodes import NodenewNode = Node()```## ContributingThe master branch is protected and you can only make changes by submitting a merge request. Please create a new branch if you would like to make changes and submit them for approval.## LicensingThe code in this project is licensed under MIT license.
